fields.name: segment_id
fields.description: Required. Foreign key to the associated segment.

fields.name: lane_num
fields.description: Required. -1, 1, 2 (use left-to-right numbering). 0 signifies a lane that is dropped on the segment.

fields.name: parent_lane_id
fields.description: Optional. If a lane drops or changes characteristics on the segment, the lane_id for that lane.

fields.name: allowed_uses
fields.description: Optional. Set of allowed uses; comma-separated. Foreign key for use group.

fields.name: r_barrier
fields.description: Optional. Whether a barrier exists to prevent vehicles from changing lanes to the right (default is none)

fields.name: l_barrier
fields.description: Optional. Whether a barrier exists to prevent vehicles from changing lanes to the left (default is none)
